title: New: Fear Of Men – Doldrums
content:
You may remember back to early August and our post about Brighton based band Fear Of Men’s debut single, ‘Ritual Confessions’. It was one of those tracks that made you sit back and say, “fuck, this is just….great”. It didn’t necessarily get me in a tizz the first time around, but the more and more I listened, the more I kept on listening. It is what it is; timeless, uncomplicated, one of those tracks that makes you appreciate good old-fashioned song writing more than ever.

Their follow up to the Italian Beach Babes release doesn’t have ‘SINGLE’ written all over it like ‘Ritual Confessions’ did. Regardless, it’s mellow and heartfelt and sports a much more cavernous sound, thanks mostly to some wonderful harmonies.

Stream the track below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
